mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, u.name, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.hit, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth from board b, user u where b.user_no=u.no order by b.group_no desc, b.no asc limit #{startRowNumber }, #{postCountPerPage }
